mapper.select: SELECT PART_NUM , PART_NAME FROM HOS_PART ORDER BY PART_NAME ASC
SELECT STAFF_NUM , PART_NAME , STAFF_NAME , STAFF_BIRTH , STAFF_TEL , STAFF_ADDR FROM HOS_STAFF STAFF, HOS_PART PART WHERE STAFF.PART_NUM = PART.PART_NUM ORDER BY STAFF_NAME ASC

SELECT STAFF_NUM , PART_NAME , STAFF_NAME , STAFF_BIRTH , STAFF_TEL , STAFF_ADDR , STAFF_GEN , DATE_FORMAT(HIRE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS HIRE_DATE FROM HOS_STAFF STAFF, HOS_PART PART WHERE STAFF.PART_NUM = PART.PART_NUM ORDER BY PART_NAME ASC, HIRE_DATE DESC, STAFF_NAME ASC

SELECT STAFF_NUM , STAFF_NAME , STAFF_BIRTH , STAFF_TEL , STAFF_ADDR , STAFF_ID , STAFF_PW , STAFF_GEN , DATE_FORMAT(HIRE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS HIRE_DATE , PART_NAME FROM HOS_STAFF STAFF, HOS_PART PART WHERE STAFF.PART_NUM = PART.PART_NUM AND STAFF_NUM = #{staffNum}
SELECT P.PART_NUM, P.PART_NAME, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_NUM FROM HOS_PART P, HOS_STAFF S WHERE P.PART_NUM = S.PART_NUM AND P.PART_NUM = #{partNum} AND STAFF_ROLE = 'DOCTOR'
